title: 'Who wins with this deal?'- Telegraph readers on this week's top stories
text:
Boris Johnson’s Brexit agreement was given the green light by the EU this week. A last-minute agreement was reached in Brussels on Thursday morning, with the Prime Minister declaring that 'now is the moment for us to get Brexit done' in response to the news.

However, the Prime Minister’s deal must still pass the House of Commons, which is meeting for a special session on Saturday, dubbed ‘super Saturday’. With many MPs strongly opposed to the deal, including the DUP, can Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal make it through Parliament? Telegraph readers shared their predictions for the result of the vote.

The start of the week saw the State Opening of Parliament and a Queen’s Speech that felt a bit pointless...
description: Boris Johnson’s Brexit agreement was given the green light by the EU this week.
